output_data.clarification_question: What was the total time documented for this established patient visit (including preparation, face-to-face, and documentation)? This is required to select the correct E/M level (99213-99215) and the appropriate psychotherapy add-on (90836 or 90838).
output_data.suggested_answer: 45 minutes (Standard follow-up duration for combined E/M and therapy, aligning with 99214 + 90836)?

primary_code.description: Established patient evaluation and management, based on time/complexity
primary_code.rationale: Established patient visit involving moderate to high complexity decision making: risk assessment (passive SI), medication management (Sertraline dosage increase from 50mg to 100mg), and severity determination (*MDD, Moderate*). The final E/M level relies on documented time or complexity criteria.

addon_codes.description: Psychotherapy, 30 minutes with evaluation and management service
addon_codes.rationale: Therapeutic interaction (exploring guilt, passive ideation, coping mechanisms) was performed concurrently with the E/M service. Assuming a session duration between 40-52 minutes (the required threshold for this add-on).

output_data.medical_necessity: Management of *Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder, Moderate* (F33.1) requiring pharmacologic intervention (Sertraline increase) and risk mitigation for passive suicidal ideation.
